column4: I finally got dvd's to play in xine.. anyone know how to get xine to play when a dvd is loaded rather then totem?
Yeah, I'd remove the totem package anyway... I can't remember where to set the default, however having totem installed....
it works for a fast mp3 player so i'll keep it .. just need to have xine play dvds.. mplayer doen't like 'em lol
